title: FS: T213 Zimmermann - raw *New Scan & Drop Drop*
author: t206blogcom

posts.post_title: FS: T213 Zimmermann - raw *New Scan & Drop Drop*
posts.post_content:
FS: 1914 T213-2 Zimmermann. There's a wrinkle from the 'Nat' up to his shoulder, a small cut mark across his right leg that extends into the first 'M' in his last name, small indention at the top of his bat and the rest you can see in the scan.

Asking $[STRIKE]55[/STRIKE] $50/obo delivered.

PayPal gift/money owed (no fees), money order or cash. 

[IMG]http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/t213-2-Zimmermann.jpg[/IMG]

Here's a link to a [URL="http://www.t206blog.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/t213-Zimmermann-High-Resolution.jpg"]high resolution image[/URL]. Despite the high resolution, I can't get the scanner to pick up the cut and the wrinkle, but they're both there.
Added link to high-resolution scan and reduced the price.
